definition[0]: to breathe air into your nose noisily, for example when you are crying or have a cold
example[1]: Stop sniffing and blow your nose.
definition[1]: to breathe air in through your nose in order to smell something
example[2]: He opened the milk and sniffed it.
example[3]: The dog was sniffing at the carpet.
definition[2]: to say something in a way that shows you think something is not good enough
definition[3]: to take a harmful drug by breathing it up your nose
definition[4]: when you breathe in air noisily through your nose, for example in order to smell something, because you have a cold, or in order to show your disapproval
definition[5]: a small amount or sign of something
example[8]: He got us into this mess, and then left at the first sniff of trouble!
